quote-source: Debora Lidov, The Drama of the Gifted Hansel, The Threepenny Review, Summer 2002.
quote-text:
Shit are we lost?
Should I tell her we’re lost?
If we had some pot, we could sleep â
and worry in the morning … I’m sure
tomorrow my friends will find us.
If I tell her, she’ll cry;
women are
so weak. I
thought we had a plan
when I lay down that bread.
Fucking birds.
